description: "A sketch of the river networks discharging into the Gulf of Siam (Gulf of Thailand), derived from the observations of mid-19th century American missionaries. Settlements along the rivers are noted, as are areas where sugarcane was grown."
title: "A   sketch   of   the   rivers   of   Siam   from   the   observations   of   the   American   missionaries   [to?]   the   Meklong   River"
